polished.name: Great Ball
polished.description: A Ball with a decent success rate.

polished.name: Ultra Ball
polished.description: A Ball with a high rate of success.

polished.name: Master Ball
polished.description: The best Ball. It never misses.

polished.name: Lure Ball
polished.description: A Ball for Pokémon hooked by a Rod.

polished.name: Moon Ball
polished.description: A Ball for Moon Stone evolvers.

polished.name: Friend Ball
polished.description: A Ball that makes Pokémon friendly.

polished.name: Fast Ball
polished.description: A Ball for catching fast Pokémon.

polished.name: Heavy Ball
polished.description: A Ball for catching heavy Pokémon.

polished.name: Love Ball
polished.description: A Ball for the opposite gender.

polished.name: Repeat Ball
polished.description: A Ball for Pokémon caught before.

polished.name: Timer Ball
polished.description: A Ball for late in a battle.

polished.name: Net Ball
polished.description: A Ball for Water or Bug Pokémon.

polished.name: Luxury Ball
polished.description: A cozy Ball to befriend Pokémon.

polished.name: Heal Ball
polished.description: A remedial Ball to heal Pokémon.

polished.name: Quick Ball
polished.description: A Ball for early in a battle.

polished.name: Dusk Ball
polished.description: A Ball for nighttime or caves.

polished.name: Revive
polished.description: Restores a fainted Pokémon to 1/2 HP.

polished.name: Ether
polished.description: Restores PP of one move by 10.

polished.name: Max Ether
polished.description: Fully restores PP of one move.

polished.name: Elixir
polished.description: Restores PP of all moves by 10.

polished.name: Max Elixir
polished.description: Fully restores the PP of one Pokémon.

polished.name: HP Up
polished.description: Raises the HP of one Pokémon.

polished.name: Rare Candy
polished.description: Raises level of a Pokémon by one.

polished.name: PP Up
polished.description: Raises max PP of a selected move.

polished.name: PP Max
polished.description: Maximizes PP of a selected move.

polished.name: Lansat Berry
polished.description: Ups critical hit ratio in a pinch.

polished.name: Starf Berry
polished.description: Ups a random stat in a pinch.

polished.name: Jaboca Berry
polished.description: Damages foe on a physical hit.

polished.name: Rowap Berry
polished.description: Damages foe on a special hit.

polished.name: Kee Berry
polished.description: Raises Defense on a physical hit.

polished.name: MarangaBerry
polished.description: Raises Sp.Def on a special hit.

polished.name: Escape Rope
polished.description: Use for escaping from caves, etc.

polished.name: Poké Doll
polished.description: Use to escape from a wild Pokémon.

polished.name: Focus Sash
polished.description: Endures one OHKO move at full HP.

polished.name: Eviolite
polished.description: Ups Def and Sp.Def of evolvers.

polished.name: Assault Vest
polished.description: Boosts Sp.Def, but bans status moves.

polished.name: Throat Spray
polished.description: Raises Sp.Atk on a sound move.

polished.name: BlundrPolicy
polished.description: Raises Speed when a move misses.

polished.name: PunchinGlove
polished.description: Powers punch moves with no contact.

polished.name: Lucky Punch
polished.description: Ups critical hit ratio of Chansey.

polished.name: Armor Suit
polished.description: A suit of armor for some Pokémon.

polished.name: Choice Band
polished.description: Boosts Attack, but allows one move.

polished.name: Choice Scarf
polished.description: Boosts Speed, but allows one move.

polished.name: Choice Specs
polished.description: Boosts Sp.Atk, but allows one move.

polished.name: Macho Brace
polished.description: Boosts stat gain, but lowers Speed.

polished.name: Power Weight
polished.description: Boosts HP gain, but lowers Speed.

polished.name: Power Bracer
polished.description: Ups Attack gain, but lowers Speed.

polished.name: Power Belt
polished.description: Ups Defense gain, but lowers Speed.

polished.name: Power Lens
polished.description: Ups Sp.Atk gain, but lowers Speed.

polished.name: Power Band
polished.description: Ups Sp.Def gain, but lowers Speed.

polished.name: Power Anklet
polished.description: Ups Speed gain, but lowers Speed.

polished.name: Upgrade
polished.description: A mysterious box made by Silph Co.

polished.name: Dubious Disc
polished.description: A transparent disc of unknown origin.

polished.name: Protector
polished.description: A protective item. Stiff and heavy.

polished.name: Electirizer
polished.description: A box packed with electric energy.

polished.name: Magmarizer
polished.description: A box packed with magma energy.

polished.name: Oval Stone
polished.description: A stone as round as a Pokémon Egg.

polished.name: Odd Souvenir
polished.description: An ornament from a far-away place.

polished.name: Nugget
polished.description: Made of pure gold. Sell high.

polished.name: Big Nugget
polished.description: Made of pure gold. Sell very high.

polished.name: BalmMushroom
polished.description: A rare mushroom. Sell very high.

polished.name: Big Pearl
polished.description: A big, beautiful pearl. Sell high.

polished.name: Pearl String
polished.description: Big, shiny pearls. Sell very high.

polished.name: Star Piece
polished.description: A hunk of red gem. Sell very high.

polished.name: Brick Piece
polished.description: A chunk of tile. Sell low.
